data.name: Winds of Change - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Over two hours of orchestral music from Winds of Change! Music by Fox Amoore and Joel Steudler!
All files are downloaded in MP3 Format @ 320kbps.

NOTE: The soundtrack will be downloaded into a "Soundtrack" folder where Winds of Change is installed!

TRACK LISTING

  • A Day in Valinorth (2:04)
  • Alestia's Pirates (2:01)
  • Bonds Broken (2:00)
  • Bonds Forged (2:00)
  • Clashing Forces (2:24)
  • Contemplation (2:00)
